name: Domenation Token
description: DOMENATION is a decentralized ecosystem focused on delivering cutting-edge gaming experiences. With the Domenation Token, users and players can immerse themselves in the ecosystem, gaining enhanced experiences across the games within this platform. Domenation Token its a ERC 20 token Cross chain. It allows players to engage in various features, such as participating in exclusive tournaments, accessing Web3 season passes, winning prizes, and interacting more deeply with the games in the ecosystem. Players can also mix and upgrade different in-game assets, further enriching their gameplay. This ecosystem is being developed by Blackmouth Games, an independent studio proud to introduce Domenation the Game: a free-to-play third-person shooter built in Unreal Engine 5. The game sets a new standard for Prime-to-Play experiences in the Web3 ecosystem, offering short matches with fresh and dynamic game modes within the Domes.
